betterquesting:10.desc:8:
Modules are installable hatches on specific multiblocks that make them more powerful.

Currently only §c5§r Multiblocks can use modular blocks, but each can only use specific ones so make sure to read the entire tooltip to know which ones can be used. 

§6Available Modules§r are: 

§cOverclock Controller Module§r: Sets machine overclock type
§cParallel Controller Module§r: Sets machine parallels
§cPower Consumption Controller Module§r: Reduces machine energy consumption
§cSpeed Controller Module§r: Increases machine processing speed
§cExecution Core Module§r: Adds additional running units to machine, enabling §9True Parallelism§r
